thread.title: Coorporate Meeting & Eevent
thread.title_full: Coorporate Meeting & Eevent - Review of Stewart Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: diellaann123
title: Coorporate Meeting & Eevent
text:
I deal with many hotels for our corporate meetings day-to-day business. The Stewart Hotel has offered us exceptional service; and is by far one of the best hotels we've been dealing with. Isabel, Adriana, Valeria, Steven, and Maria I. provided wonderful service and made our entire day fantastic.
I would not hesitate to go back.
